nodes.bodyText: I think we should make this category the second one, before experimental features.

Shall we group this with the rest of the "Language concepts" examples?
And I guess the column should be 2 and we should list this after the "Concurrency" examples maybe?
Unnecessary indentation?

nodes.bodyText: Do we need this?
Again, since these examples only demo one example, I think we don't need this.
Shouldn't these be indented?

Also, please check the column count. The maximum we should have in examples is 80.
Please see https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/master/docs/bbe-guidelines/bbe-guidelines.md

Add stream constructor sample to streams bbe
Rename bal, description and out files as per standard
Fix formatting and categorize bbes under preview features
